properties.entry: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER(USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , GENDER , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , FOOD_INTEREST , CLEAN_INTEREST) VALUES(SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,?)
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
